https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hpX04xo6927uRZ88gGPogl1BMup.jpg Recently retired accountant Richard Flicker attends a life-drawing class and his world is turned upside down when he encounters free-spirited Amelia, the spitting image of a long lost love from decades ago. Grappling with a troubled home front, Richard flirts with the temptation of this second chance at romance. A Case of Blue
